content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-16.5, -51.5), connected to the Wooden Chest
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5), connected to the Wooden Chest

### Furnace Setup at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5), connected to the Stone Furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to obstruction
- Ensure the target location is clear of any existing objects before attempting to place a new entity. Remove any obstructing entities beforehand.

### Errors when placing entities from a distance
- Move closer to the target position before placing an entity. The maximum distance allowed is 10 units.

### Undefined or incorrect variable usage
- Ensure all variables are properly defined before use. Double-check for typos or incorrect names, such as 'furnace_input_inserter' which was not defined.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the existence of an entity at a specified position before attempting to retrieve it. Ensure the correct type and position are specified.
